name: Glow (itch) (Gameheads, Jayfeather317, Ryan, TeamKraft5, Rastatrevftw1538)
description:
Glow is a top down dungeon-crawler diving into the story of Dew, a young Zinstrata fighting a range of battles in a less-than perfect land. During her quest she starts to understand the true necessity of RESILIENCE to conquer her darkest challenges.

How to Play 

In GLOW, you control your character with WASD, block fierce attacks with Right Mouse Button, and use Ability buttons such as E, Q, and X to take down your enemies. Make sure to pick up resilience orbs when you see them scattered around the level in order to open the doors to get to the next level.  Keep an eye on the shine bar, when it is filled you can use your ult!

Controls 

Key Controls 

E is to absorb enemies which decreases their size 

Q is to push enemies away from you

X is your ultimate 

Left Click is push back enemies

Right Click is block enemies with wand
